org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client

Class ProfileRestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matrix.androidsdk.RestClient<ProfileApi>
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.rest.client.ProfileRestClient

  • public class ProfileRestClient
extends RestClient<ProfileApi>
    Class used to make requests to the profile API.
